title: DDFP 599: Week 2 recap & Ike on Steelers' Wideouts
itunes:title: DDFP 599: Week 2 recap & Ike on Steelers' Wideouts
description:
Dave Dameshek is joined by Maurice Jones-Drew and Colleen Wolfe to recap the biggest storylines from Week 2 of NFL action, notably whether or not the Jags will return to their Week 1 selves after this week's loss to the Titans. Also, the fellas and Colleen determine the best 2-0 team, best 1-1 team and best 0-2 team ahead of Week 3. Plus, in this week's edition of the Q and A, the guys answer questions from Raiders OT Donald Penn, Packers TE Martellus Bennett and some loyal members of the Shek Republic.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
